showtop <- function(top){
  top1 = top  %>% dplyr::mutate(rate = round(as.numeric(positive), 4)) %>% 
            dplyr::select(-No_probes, -positive)  %>%
    dplyr::rename(Hypermethylation_prop. = rate)
  name = substitute(top)
  kable(top1, digits = c(1,1,1,1,1,15,1,4), caption = name)
}
showtop(top_f_pfhxs)
showtop(top_f_pfos)
showtop(top_f_pfoa)

showtop(top_m_pfos)
